s: Previous review: This was the first time I tried this brand. "Fragrance Free" does not mean free of any smell, this product does have an odor from the ingredients. I'm on day two and I don't think I can use it again. The odor sticks around all day and while it isn't overpowering it's there....all day. The styling and the hold were good, but due to the offensive odor, I can't rate it any higher. ... I've tried several beard balms, some were too waxy and others too greasy. Gentleman...
